thread.title: Valtori's change negotiations shock trade union JHL – "apparently nothing is enough"
thread.title_full: Valtori's change negotiations shock trade union JHL – "apparently nothing is enough"

author: Justus Vento
title: Valtori's change negotiations shock trade union JHL – "apparently nothing is enough"
text:
The change negotiations at the Government ICT Center Valtori threaten to crush the entire center, criticizes Kristian Karrasch, the negotiation manager for public contract sectors of the trade union JHL. The negotiations threaten the jobs of up to 160 people.
Uutinen
Valtori's change negotiations shock trade union JHL – "apparently nothing is enough"
Justus Vento,
[Tivi in English](/aiheet/tivi-in-english)[Public Sector It](/aiheet/public-sector-it)The change negotiations at the Government ICT Center Valtori could lead to the dismissal of 160 people.
Justus Vento
